response.overview: TOUCH is a story about the power of love and how we pass that love from one generation to the next. Riley and her grandmother, Nana, always had a special relationship centered around baking.  Riley's mother, Babs, never understood this connection, nor had much in common with her daughter.  When Nana is put into hospice, Riley's whole world is thrown into chaos, but when she finds a mysterious recipe at Nana's bakery, it creates an opportunity  to forgive past wrongs.
response.tagline: As Riley's grandmother nears death and her unsupportive mother fails her again, she must find her way using lessons from her Nana's kitchen.
response.title: Touch
